comprehensive_overview: BMGE (Block Mapping and Gathering with Entropy) is a software tool designed for the alignment of homologous DNA or protein sequences. It employs block mapping and entropy-based techniques to identify and remove poorly aligned regions, thereby improving the accuracy of multiple sequence alignments.
core_features: Alignment of homologous DNA or protein sequences
Utilizes block mapping and entropy-based techniques
Identification and removal of poorly aligned regions
Improves accuracy of multiple sequence alignments
